alert.note: Alert for Kohala (Hawaii) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued December 09 at 3:44PM HST until December 10 at 6:00AM HST by NWS Honolulu
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY FOR PORTIONS OF HAWAII AND MAUI COUNTIES UNTIL 6 AM HST SATURDAY... .Especially breezy trades will gradually weaken by Saturday. The strongest winds will occur over and downwind of terrain, and in saddle areas between mountains. ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM HST SATURDAY... ...HIGH WIND WARNING IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...East winds 20 to 35 mph with localized gusts up to 55 mph. * WHERE...Kohala. * WHEN...Until 6 AM HST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Winds this strong can tear off shingles, knock down tree branches, blow away tents and awnings and make it difficult to steer, especially for drivers of high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Watch out for falling tree branches when walking or driving. Make sure tents and awnings are secure or take them down. Be prepared for power outages.
